/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the city's daily life. The sun shines brightly in the clear blue sky, casting a warm glow on the scene below. The street is lined with trees and buildings, adding a touch of urban greenery to the concrete jungle. Cars and buses fill the road, indicating a busy time of day. The image is taken from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, adding a sense of grandeur to the everyday hustle and bustle.
